titles.title: Expressing support for designation of September as Childhood Cancer Awareness Month.
Expressing support for designation of September as Childhood Cancer Awareness Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the designation of Childhood Cancer Awareness Month.
Applauds the actions of medical professionals and other caregivers, researchers, patients and their families, and others who strive to combat and raise public awareness of childhood cancer.
